itemDescription: Governor of the Bank of England

wikipedia_page.main: John Bowden was Governor of the Bank of England from 1822 to 1824. He had been Deputy Governor from 1820 to 1822. He replaced Charles Pole as Governor and was succeeded by Cornelius Buller.

link_mentions.page: Governor of the Bank of England

response: *John Bowden (banker), Governor of the Bank of England, 1822–1824
